## ‚úÖ **Notification Dropdown Icons Added**

```diff
+                       className={`p-4 rounded-lg border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700 ${

+                             <div className="bg-white dark:bg-gray-600 rounded-md p-3 mb-3">
+                               <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-2">
+                                 <h5 className="font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white text-sm">
+                                   {notification.eventTitle}
+                                 </h5>
+                                 <Link
+                                   to={`/events/${notification.eventId}`}
+                                   className="text-xs text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-400 hover:underline"
+                                 >
+                                   View Event
+                                 </Link>
+                               </div>
+                               <div className="grid grid-cols-1 gap-1 text-xs text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400">
+                                 <div className="flex items-center">
+                                   <CalendarIcon className="h-3 w-3 mr-2" />
+                                   <span>{new Date(notification.eventDate).toLocaleDateString()}</span>
+                                 </div>
+                                 <div className="flex items-center">
+                                   <svg className="h-3 w-3 mr-2" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
+                                     <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M17.657 16.657L13.414 20.9a1.998 1.998 0 01-2.827 0l-4.244-4.243a8 8 0 1111.314 0z" />

+                                   </svg>
+                                   <span>{notification.eventLocation}</span>
+                                 </div>

+                             </div>

+                       notifications.forEach(n => !n.read && markAsRead(n.id));
+                     }}
+                     className="text-sm text-blue-600 dark:text-blue-400 hover:underline"
+                   >
+                     Mark all as read
+                   </button>
+                 </div>

+                   className="w-full bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white py-2 px-4 rounded-lg text-sm font-medium transition-colors"
+                 >
+                   View All Notifications
+                 </button>
+               </div>
+             )}
+           </div>
+         </>
+       )}
      </nav>
    );
```

Now let me also add keyboard support to close the panel with the Escape key:


---

<details><summary>Edit file: bilten-frontend/src/components/Navbar.js</summary>

undefined

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 20, lines removed: undefined

```diff
@@ -125,4 +125,24 @@
      };
    }, []);
+ 
+   // Handle keyboard events for notifications panel
+   useEffect(() => {
+     const handleKeyDown = (event) => {
+       if (event.key === 'Escape' && isNotificationsPanelOpen) {
+         setIsNotificationsPanelOpen(false);
+       }
+     };
+ 
+     if (isNotificationsPanelOpen) {
+       document.addEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
+       // Prevent body scroll when panel is open
+       document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
+     }
+ 
+     return () => {
+       document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleKeyDown);
+       document.body.style.overflow = 'unset';
+     };
+   }, [isNotificationsPanelOpen]);
  
    // Load wishlist for badge count when authenticated
```

  * messages: Implemented sliding notification panel that slides from the right side:

**Key Features Added:**
- **Sliding Animation**: Panel slides in from right with smooth transform transition
- **Backdrop**: Semi-transparent black overlay that closes panel when clicked
- **Full Height**: Panel takes full viewport height with proper scrolling
- **Responsive Width**: 384px (w-96) on desktop, 90vw max on mobile
- **Keyboard Support**: Escape key closes the panel
- **Body Scroll Lock**: Prevents background scrolling when panel is open

**Panel Structure:**
- **Header**: Bell icon, title, unread count badge, close button
- **Content**: Scrollable notification list with icons and actions
- **Footer**: Unread count, "Mark all as read" button, "View All" button

- **Duration**: 300ms with ease-in-out timing
- **Z-index**: 50 for panel, 40 for backdrop
- **Shadow**: shadow-2xl for depth

## ‚úÖ **Sliding Notification Panel Implemented**

### **ÔøΩÔøΩ Key Features:**

2. **Full-Screen Experience**:

**Header Section:**
- Bell icon with blue color
- "Notifications" title

- Close button (X)

- Scrollable notification list

- Unread count display
- "Mark all as read" button

### **‚ú® Animation Details:**

- **Transform**: `translate-x-0` (visible) / `translate-x-full` (hidden)
- **Duration**: 300ms with `ease-in-out` timing
- **Z-index**: 50 for panel, 40 for backdrop
- **Shadow**: `shadow-2xl` for depth and visual separation

### **üéØ User Experience:**

1. **Click** the notification bell ‚Üí Panel slides in from right
2. **View** all notifications in a dedicated space
3. **Interact** with notifications (mark read, delete)
4. **Close** via multiple methods for convenience
5. **Navigate** to full notifications page if needed

```diff
+                   <span className="bg-blue-500 text-white text-xs px-2 py-0.5 rounded-full">
+                     {getTotalItems()}
+                   </span>
+                 )}
+               </div>
+               <button
+                 onClick={() => setIsCartPanelOpen(false)}
+                 className="p-1.5 text-gray-400 hover:text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:text-white transition-colors"
+               >
+                 <svg className="w-4 h-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
+                   <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12" />
+                 </svg>
+               </button>
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* Panel Content */}
+             <div className="flex-1 overflow-y-auto max-h-[calc(100vh-12rem)]">
+               {basketItems.length === 0 ? (
+                 <div className="text-center py-12">
+                   <ShoppingCartIcon className="w-12 h-12 text-gray-400 dark:text-gray-500 mx-auto mb-4" />
+                   <h3 className="text-lg font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-2">
+                     {t('nav.basketEmpty')}
+                   </h3>
+                   <p className="text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400">
+                     Your basket is empty. Start shopping for amazing events!
+                   </p>
+                 </div>
+               ) : (
+                 <div className="p-3 space-y-3 pb-4">
+                   {basketItems.map((item, index) => (
+                     <div
+                       key={item.id}
+                       className="bg-white dark:bg-gray-800 rounded-lg border border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700 shadow-sm transform transition-all duration-300 ease-out hover:scale-[1.02] hover:shadow-md"
+                       style={{
+                         animationDelay: `${index * 100}ms`,
+                         animation: isCartPanelOpen ? 'slideInFromRight 0.5s ease-out forwards' : 'none'
+                       }}
+                     >
+                       <div className="p-3">
+                         <div className="flex items-start space-x-3">
+                           {/* Event Image */}
+                           <div className="w-16 h-16 bg-gray-100 dark:bg-gray-600 rounded-md flex-shrink-0 overflow-hidden">
+                             <img
+                               src={item.event.cover_image_url || 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1470229722913-7c0e2dbbafd3?w=400&h=300&fit=crop'}
+                               alt={item.event.title}
+                               className="w-full h-full object-cover"
+                               onError={(e) => {
+                                 e.target.src = 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1470229722913-7c0e2dbbafd3?w=400&h=300&fit=crop';
+                               }}
+                             />
+                           </div>
+ 
+                           {/* Event Details */}
+                           <div className="flex-1 min-w-0">
+                             <h4 className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white mb-1">
+                               {item.event.title}
+                             </h4>
+                             <p className="text-xs text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 mb-2">
+                               {item.ticket_type} ‚Ä¢ {t('nav.quantity')}: {item.quantity}
+                             </p>
+                             <div className="flex items-center justify-between">
+                               <span className="text-sm font-bold text-gray-900 dark:text-white">
+                                 ${item.total_price.toFixed(2)}
+                               </span>
+                               <button
+                                 onClick={() => removeFromBasket(item.id)}
+                                 className="text-red-500 dark:text-red-400 hover:text-red-700 dark:hover:text-red-300 transition-colors"
+                                 title={t('nav.removeFromBasket')}
+                               >
+                                 <svg className="w-4 h-4" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
+                                   <path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12" />
+                                 </svg>
+                               </button>
+                             </div>
+                           </div>
+                         </div>
+                       </div>
+                     </div>
+                   ))}
+                 </div>
+               )}
+             </div>
+ 
+             {/* Panel Footer */}
+             {basketItems.length > 0 && (
+               <div className="border-t border-gray-200 dark:border-gray-700 p-3">
+                 <div className="flex items-center justify-between mb-3">
+                   <span className="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 dark:text-white">{t('nav.total')}</span>
+                   <span className="text-lg font-bold text-gray-900 dark:text-white">
+                     ${basketItems.reduce((total, item) => total + item.total_price, 0).toFixed(2)}
+                   </span>
+                 </div>
+                 <button
+                   onClick={() => {
+                     setIsCartPanelOpen(false);
+                     navigate('/pasket');
+                   }}
+                   className="w-full bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white py-3 px-4 rounded-md text-sm font-medium transition-colors"
+                 >
+                   {t('nav.proceedToCheckout')}
+                 </button>
+               </div>
+             )}
+           </div>
+         </>
+       )}
      </nav>
      </>
```

</details>

Perfect! I've implemented the mutual exclusivity logic for the notification and cart panels. Here's what I've added:

## ‚úÖ **Mutual Exclusivity Implemented**

### **üîî Notification Button Logic:**
- **When Cart is Open**: Clicking notification icon closes cart first, then opens notifications
- **When Cart is Closed**: Clicking notification icon toggles notifications normally
- **Applied to**: Both LTR and RTL notification buttons

### **ÔøΩÔøΩ Cart Button Logic:**
- **When Notifications is Open**: Clicking cart icon closes notifications first, then opens cart
- **When Notifications is Closed**: Clicking cart icon toggles cart normally
- **Applied to**: Both LTR and RTL cart buttons

### **‚ú® How It Works:**

1. **Click Notification Icon**:
   - If cart panel is open ‚Üí closes cart panel ‚Üí opens notification panel
   - If cart panel is closed ‚Üí toggles notification panel

2. **Click Cart Icon**:
   - If notification panel is open ‚Üí closes notification panel ‚Üí opens cart panel
   - If notification panel is closed ‚Üí toggles cart panel

### **üéØ Benefits:**

- ‚úÖ **Only One Panel Open**: Prevents UI conflicts and overlapping panels
- ‚úÖ **Smooth Transitions**: Clean switching between panels
- ‚úÖ **Better UX**: Clear, predictable behavior
- ‚úÖ **No Confusion**: Users always know which panel is active
- ‚úÖ **Consistent**: Works the same for both LTR and RTL layouts

Now when you click on either the notification or cart icon, it will automatically close the other panel if it's open, ensuring only one panel is visible at a time!

  * messages: Added RTL support for sliding panels to appear on left side in Arabic:

**Notification Panel RTL Changes:**
- **Position**: Added `rtl:left-0 rtl:right-auto` to position panel on left side
- **Backdrop**: Applied same RTL positioning to backdrop
- **Rounded Corners**: Changed from `rounded-l-lg` to `rtl:rounded-l-none rtl:rounded-r-lg`
- **Animation**: Added `rtl:-translate-x-full` for left-to-right sliding animation

**Cart Panel RTL Changes:**
- **Position**: Added `rtl:left-0 rtl:right-auto` to position panel on left side
- **Backdrop**: Applied same RTL positioning to backdrop
- **Rounded Corners**: Changed from `rounded-l-lg` to `rtl:rounded-l-none rtl:rounded-r-lg`
- **Animation**: Added `rtl:-translate-x-full` for left-to-right sliding animation

**RTL Behavior:**
- **LTR (English)**: Panels slide in from right side
- **RTL (Arabic)**: Panels slide in from left side
- **Consistent UX**: Maintains natural reading direction for each language
- **Proper Corners**: Rounded corners on appropriate sides for each direction

Perfect! I've added RTL support for both sliding panels so they appear on the left side in Arabic:

## ‚úÖ **RTL Support Added for Sliding Panels**

### **üåç Language-Specific Positioning:**

**English (LTR):**
- ‚úÖ Panels slide in from the **right side**
- ‚úÖ Rounded corners on the **left side**
- ‚úÖ Natural right-to-left sliding animation

**Arabic (RTL):**
- ‚úÖ Panels slide in from the **left side**
- ‚úÖ Rounded corners on the **right side**
- ‚úÖ Natural left-to-right sliding animation

### **üîß Technical Changes:**

1. **Position Classes**:
   - Added `rtl:left-0 rtl:right-auto` to both panels
   - Panels now position on left side in RTL mode

2. **Rounded Corners**:
   - Changed from `rounded-l-lg` to `rtl:rounded-l-none rtl:rounded-r-lg`
   - Proper corner rounding for each direction

3. **Animation Direction**:
   - Added `rtl:-translate-x-full` for RTL sliding animation
   - Panels slide in from left in Arabic

4. **Backdrop Positioning**:
   - Applied same RTL positioning to backdrop overlays
   - Consistent coverage for both directions

### **‚ú® User Experience:**
- **Natural Flow**: Panels follow the reading direction of each language
- **Consistent Behavior**: Same functionality, different positioning
- **Cultural Adaptation**: Respects Arabic UI conventions
- **Smooth Transitions**: Proper animations for both directions

Now when users switch to Arabic, both the notification and cart panels will slide in from the left side, following Arabic reading direction conventions!
